text.autoconfig.smoothboot.title: Smooth Boot
text.autoconfig.smoothboot.option.thread:
Thread Count (lower = use less CPU, higher = use more CPU)
For best performance set to 1 less than your CPU's thread count.
Reduce if you are running into overheating issues or want the computer to use less power.
This value greatly affect load times.

Thread Priority (lower = more performance for other processes, higher = more performance for Minecraft, default = 5)
Refer to the javadoc of java.lang.Thread for more information.
